text:
e="preserve">Bertram Stanley Mitford Bowyer, 2nd Baron Denham, KBE, PC (born 3 October 1927), is a British Conservative politician. He is a member of the House of Lords as one of the remaining hereditary peers. He is one of the few people to serve in the governments of five different Prime Ministers.
Following the death of Lord Carrington in July 2018, Denham has been the longest-serving current member of the House of Lords.
